name: Empty Ocean World
description:
A first person survival 3D game made by Anagh's World for Trijam #153, Mini Jam #98, Godot Wild Jam #41 and Wasted Resources This game is developed in support of preventing Global Warming. Healing the planet starts in your garage, in your kitchen, and at your dining room table. Here is how you can do it: 45+ Easy and Simple Ways To Stop Global Warming and Reduce Earth’s Temperature

Please Note: If you feel the game lags in the browser, then please download Windows playable version available at the end of the page. Linux & Mac users please use Wine to run the .exe file.

For better experience, play in FULLSCREEN and with HEADSETS.

Plot

Due to global warming, the water levels went up so high that the entire world got covered with the ocean, except for a small piece of land. You luckily reached this land using your personal chopper and now you need to survive alone. The entire world is empty!

Jams & Themes

  • Trijam #153 (Empty World)
    • The entire world is empty, except for you.
  • Mini Jam 98 (Empty)
    • The limitation was 'Make it a Roguelike', so the best what I could do is for 'Run based gameplay' - You need to continuously run to collect food & for 'Procedurally generated content' - Food and enemies are procedurally generated. If you die, you need to start all over again.
  • Godot Wild Jam #41 (Ocean)
    • Wildcard (All sounds in-game are made with your mouth) - Almost all :P
  • Wasted Resources (Don't Waste (y)our Energy)
    • The player needs to save his health/energy to survive. The more he runs to collect food, his energy goes down. He has to balance both, saving his energy and collecting food to eat.

Overview

"Empty Ocean World" is a first person 3D game where the main goal of the game is to survive. Collect food like crab and starfish that get pushed to the land from the ocean. But be careful, there are lot of jelly-fishes as well, that might sting you. You are all alone, try to survive as long as possible.

Controls

  • Movement
    • WASD/Arrow Keys/Gamepad D-Pad
  • Eat Food
    • E/Ctrl/Gamepad Triangle
  • Enable Free Look
    • LMB/Gamepad Square
  • Free look
    • Mouse
  • Start
    • Enter/Space/Gamepad Cross
  • Restart
    • R/Gamepad Start
  • Quit
    • ESC/Gamepad Circle

Credits

  • Concept, Design & Programming
    • Anagh's World - using Godot 3.2.3
  • Graphics/Textures
    • Anagh's World
  • Music
    • leohpaz @ opengameart.org (background music)
    • Anagh's World (other sounds)

Dev Hi-Score: 1187 Seconds (proof in screenshot). If you can beat it, then please let me know with a screenshot in below comments section.
